input.label: Account ID
input.populatingSearch: |aclinputlookup all_account_ids | mvcombine delim=", " name | nomv name | eval title=account_id." (".name.")"

search.query: | aclinputlookup cloudfront_edges | search $accountId$ | fields id, domain_name
| tstats dc(CloudFront_Access_Log.x_edge_request_id) as count FROM datamodel=CloudFront_Access_Log where $domain_names$ AND ($cloudfront_datamodel_restrictions$) | nadefault count

| tstats dc(CloudFront_Access_Log.x_edge_request_id) as count FROM datamodel=CloudFront_Access_Log where CloudFront_Access_Log.sc_status>399 AND $domain_names$ AND ($cloudfront_datamodel_restrictions$) | nadefault count

| tstats sum(CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_bytes) as cs_bytes FROM datamodel=CloudFront_Access_Log where $domain_names$ AND ($cloudfront_datamodel_restrictions$) | eval cs_bytes = case(cs_bytes>1024*1024*1024, tostring(round(cs_bytes/1024/1024/1024,2))+" GB", cs_bytes>1024*1024, tostring(round(cs_bytes/1024/1024,2))+" MB", cs_bytes>1024, tostring(round(cs_bytes/1024,2))+" KB", true(), tostring(cs_bytes)+" B") | nadefault cs_bytes

| tstats sum(CloudFront_Access_Log.sc_bytes) as sc_bytes FROM datamodel=CloudFront_Access_Log where $domain_names$ AND ($cloudfront_datamodel_restrictions$) | eval sc_bytes = case(sc_bytes>1024*1024*1024, tostring(round(sc_bytes/1024/1024/1024,2))+" GB", sc_bytes>1024*1024, tostring(round(sc_bytes/1024/1024,2))+" MB", sc_bytes>1024, tostring(round(sc_bytes/1024,2))+" KB", true(), tostring(sc_bytes)+" B") | nadefault sc_bytes

| tstats dc(CloudFront_Access_Log.x_edge_request_id) as count, latest(CloudFront_Access_Log.x_edge_result_type) as result_type FROM datamodel=CloudFront_Access_Log where $domain_names$ AND ($cloudfront_datamodel_restrictions$) by CloudFront_Access_Log.x_edge_result_type | stats sum(eval(count*if(result_type=="Hit" OR result_type=="RefreshHit",1,0))) as hit_count, sum(eval(count*if(result_type=="Hit" OR result_type=="RefreshHit" OR result_type=="Miss" OR result_type=="Error",1,0))) as total_count | eval percent=tostring(round(hit_count*100/total_count, 2))+" %" | nadefault percent

| tstats sum(CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_bytes) as cs_bytes, sum(CloudFront_Access_Log.sc_bytes) as sc_bytes FROM datamodel=CloudFront_Access_Log where $domain_names$ AND ($cloudfront_datamodel_restrictions$) by CloudFront_Access_Log.client_ip, CloudFront_Access_Log.client_ip_lon, CloudFront_Access_Log.client_ip_lat | iplocation CloudFront_Access_Log.client_ip | eval traffic=cs_bytes+sc_bytes, location=if(City=="",Country,City+","+Country) | sort 100 - traffic | geostats latfield=CloudFront_Access_Log.client_ip_lat longfield=CloudFront_Access_Log.client_ip_lon sum(traffic) by location

| tstats dc(CloudFront_Access_Log.x_edge_request_id) as count FROM datamodel=CloudFront_Access_Log where $domain_names$ AND ($cloudfront_datamodel_restrictions$) by CloudFront_Access_Log.client_ip, CloudFront_Access_Log.client_ip_lon, CloudFront_Access_Log.client_ip_lat | iplocation CloudFront_Access_Log.client_ip | eval location=if(City=="",Country,City+","+Country) | sort 100 - count | geostats latfield=CloudFront_Access_Log.client_ip_lat longfield=CloudFront_Access_Log.client_ip_lon sum(count) by location

| tstats dc(CloudFront_Access_Log.x_edge_request_id) as count FROM datamodel=CloudFront_Access_Log where $domain_names$ AND CloudFront_Access_Log.sc_status!="000" AND ($cloudfront_datamodel_restrictions$) by CloudFront_Access_Log.sc_status | fields CloudFront_Access_Log.sc_status, count | rename CloudFront_Access_Log.sc_status AS "HTTP Status"

| datamodel CloudFront_Access_Log CloudFront_Access_Log search | search $domain_names$ AND ($cloudfront_datamodel_restrictions$) | rename CloudFront_Access_Log.http_user_agent as http_user_agent, CloudFront_Access_Log.x_edge_request_id as request_id | useragent http_user_agent | stats dc(request_id) as count by ua_family | rename ua_family as "User Agent"

drilldown.link: search?q=search `aws-accesslog-sourcetype("cloudfront")` | rename cs_user_agent as http_user_agent | useragent http_user_agent | search ua_family="$click.value$"&earliest=$earliest$&latest=$latest$

search.query: | tstats dc(CloudFront_Access_Log.x_edge_request_id) as count, latest(CloudFront_Access_Log.x_edge_result_type) as result_type, latest(CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_host) as cs_host FROM datamodel=CloudFront_Access_Log where $domain_names$ AND ($cloudfront_datamodel_restrictions$) by CloudFront_Access_Log.x_edge_result_type CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_host | stats sum(eval(count*if(result_type=="Hit" OR result_type=="RefreshHit",1,0))) as hit_count, sum(eval(count*if(result_type=="Hit" OR result_type=="RefreshHit" OR result_type=="Miss" OR result_type=="Error",1,0))) as total_count by cs_host | eval percent=tostring(round(hit_count*100/total_count, 2))+" %" | join cs_host [search earliest=-1d `aws-description($accountId$, "*", "cloudfront_distributions", "id")` | dedup domain_name | rename domain_name as cs_host] | table id, cs_host, account_id, hit_count, total_count, percent, status, origin.dns_name | rename id as ID, cs_host as "Domain Name", account_id as "Account ID", hit_count as "Hit Count", total_count as "Request Count", percent as "Hit Ratio", status as "Status", origin.dns_name as "S3 Origin"

| tstats dc(CloudFront_Access_Log.x_edge_request_id) as count, latest(CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_referer) as referer, latest(CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_host) as host FROM datamodel=CloudFront_Access_Log where $domain_names$ AND CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_referer!="-" AND ($cloudfront_datamodel_restrictions$) by CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_referer CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_host | sort - count | table referer, host, count | rename referer as "Referer Domain Name", host as "Edge Domain Name", count as "Request Count"

| tstats dc(CloudFront_Access_Log.x_edge_request_id) as count FROM datamodel=CloudFront_Access_Log where $domain_names$ AND ($cloudfront_datamodel_restrictions$) by CloudFront_Access_Log.edge_location_name | sort - count | eventstats sum(count) as total | eval percent=tostring(round(100*count/total, 2))+"%" | table CloudFront_Access_Log.edge_location_name, count, percent | rename CloudFront_Access_Log.edge_location_name as "Edge Location", count as "Request Count", percent as "Percentage"

| tstats avg(CloudFront_Access_Log.time_taken) as time_taken FROM datamodel=CloudFront_Access_Log where $domain_names$ AND ($cloudfront_datamodel_restrictions$) by CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_host CloudFront_Access_Log.edge_location_name CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_uri_stem | sort 100 - time_taken | eval time_taken = round(time_taken, 2) | table CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_host, CloudFront_Access_Log.edge_location_name, CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_uri_stem, time_taken | rename CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_host as "Edge Domain", CloudFront_Access_Log.edge_location_name as "Edge Location", CloudFront_Access_Log.uri_stem as "Request URI", time_taken as "Time (ms)", CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_uri_stem as "Request URI"

| tstats avg(CloudFront_Access_Log.sc_bytes) as sc_bytes, avg(CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_bytes) as cs_bytes FROM datamodel=CloudFront_Access_Log where $domain_names$ AND ($cloudfront_datamodel_restrictions$) by CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_host CloudFront_Access_Log.edge_location_name CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_uri_stem | eval total_traffic=sc_bytes+cs_bytes | sort 100 - total_traffic | eval total_traffic=case(total_traffic>1024*1024*1024, tostring(round(total_traffic/1024/1024/1024,2))+" GB", total_traffic>1024*1024, tostring(round(total_traffic/1024/1024,2))+" MB", total_traffic>1024, tostring(round(total_traffic/1024,2))+" KB", true(), tostring(round(total_traffic,2))+" B") | eval cs_traffic=case(cs_bytes>1024*1024*1024, tostring(round(cs_bytes/1024/1024/1024,2))+" GB", cs_bytes>1024*1024, tostring(round(cs_bytes/1024/1024,2))+" MB", cs_bytes>1024, tostring(round(cs_bytes/1024,2))+" KB", true(), tostring(round(cs_bytes,2))+" B") | eval sc_traffic=case(sc_bytes>1024*1024*1024, tostring(round(sc_bytes/1024/1024/1024,2))+" GB", sc_bytes>1024*1024, tostring(round(sc_bytes/1024/1024,2))+" MB", sc_bytes>1024, tostring(round(sc_bytes/1024,2))+" KB", true(), tostring(round(sc_bytes,2))+" B") | table CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_host, CloudFront_Access_Log.edge_location_name, CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_uri_stem, cs_traffic, sc_traffic, total_traffic | rename CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_host as "Edge Domain", CloudFront_Access_Log.edge_location_name as "Edge Location", CloudFront_Access_Log.uri_stem as "Request URI", cs_traffic as "Request Traffic", sc_traffic as "Response Traffic", total_traffic as "Total Traffic"

| tstats sum(CloudFront_Access_Log.time_taken) as time_taken FROM datamodel=CloudFront_Access_Log where $domain_names$ AND ($cloudfront_datamodel_restrictions$) by CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_host _time span=1h | timechart sum(time_taken) by CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_host

| tstats sum(CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_bytes) as cs_bytes, sum(CloudFront_Access_Log.sc_bytes) as sc_bytes FROM datamodel=CloudFront_Access_Log where $domain_names$ AND ($cloudfront_datamodel_restrictions$) by CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_host _time span=1h | eval total_traffic=sc_bytes+cs_bytes | timechart sum(eval(round(total_traffic/1024/1024,2))) by CloudFront_Access_Log.cs_host
